programs.title: Bachelor of Business Administration (BBA)
programs.overview: The BBA program at St. Francis de Sales College is designed to nurture aspiring business leaders by providing a strong foundation in management principles, business ethics, and entrepreneurial skills.

specializations_offered.Marketing: Learn the art of market analysis, branding, and strategic sales management.
specializations_offered.Human Resources: Gain expertise in talent acquisition, employee engagement, and organizational development.
specializations_offered.Finance: Master financial planning, investment strategies, and risk management.

program_details.eligibility: A pre-university from a recognized institution
program_details.campus_infrastructure: State-of-the-art facilities, including smart classrooms, libraries, and technology labs.
program_details.placement_assistance: Dedicated career support team to help students secure internships and job opportunities.
